object of the class Matchfield to add it to the gamePane
matchfield - Variable in class gui.view.Matchfield
grid pane for the matchfield with a size of 20 x 30 tiles
Matchfield - Class in gui.view
This class implements the grid pane with the matchfield and offers methods to fill the pane with image views of the ground, the buildings and the moving objects.

Constructor without parameters.
Matchfield(int, int, int) - Constructor for class gui.view.Matchfield
Constructor with parameters that initializes the pane and all image views.

the actual Matchfield object that has been created in the method createNewGame() or reloadGame() in the class Game

the actual Matchfield object that has been created in the method createNewGame() or reloadGame() in the class Game

This class implements the menuScene.

move(char) - Method in class gui.controller.MovingObjectController
This method moves the moving object depending on the direction that is handed to it.
moveDown(GameScene) - Method in class gameboard.objects.MovingObject
This method represents the functionality of each object to move down.
moveLeft(GameScene) - Method in class gameboard.objects.MovingObject
This method represents the functionality of each object to move left.
moveObject() - Method in class gui.controller.MovingObjectController
This method proofs if only one of the directions right, left, up and down is pressed.

This method represents the functionality of each object to move right.

the actual MovingObject object that has been created in the method createNewGame() or reloadGame() in the class Game
MovingException - Exception in exceptions
Exception class that is responsible for the exceptions that are thrown when the player tries to move the moving object off the matchfield.
MovingException(String, InformationBox) - Constructor for exception exceptions.MovingException
Constructor that sets the String of the parameter as text of the news tex field of the information box.

object of the class MovingObject

MovingObject - Class in gameboard.objects
This class represents any object on the gameboard, that is able to move.
MovingObject() - Constructor for class gameboard.objects.MovingObject
This constructor is there for starting the game.
MovingObject(int, int, boolean) - Constructor for class gameboard.objects.MovingObject

MovingObjectController - Class in gui.controller
This class implements some methods to move around and to process the fields.
MovingObjectController(GameScene, MovingObject, GameController, GameValue, Farmer, Tractor, Harvester, Cultivator, DumpTruck, SeedDrill, FieldTile, Silo, CourtTrade) - Constructor for class gui.controller.MovingObjectController
Constructor of the class MovingObjectController that initializes some objects and by calling the method initializeFunctionaliy() an object of the class MovingObjectFunctionalityController to make some actions possible.
MovingObjectFunctionalityController - Class in gui.controller
This class implements all the actions that are possible when moving around e. g. selecting a vehicle, exiting and entering or unload grain to the silo or sell it at the court trade.
MovingObjectFunctionalityController(GameScene) - Constructor for class gui.controller.MovingObjectFunctionalityController
Constructor that initializes the variables of this class.
movingObjectImageView - Variable in class gui.view.Matchfield
image view of the moving object
movingSuccessful(int, int) - Method in class gui.controller.MovingObjectController
If moving is successful the image view of the moving object is set to the new tile and if the tractor or the harvester is selected the tank gets decreased.
